local_intent: Pull along +Y by 0.1 to open the dishwasher door, verifying ContainerOpen with one retry.
assumptions: +Y axis corresponds to outward pull direction for the door handle.
coherence_with_global: Implements the RetryUntilSuccessful block from GLOBAL_BT using MoveDelta(y,0.1,800) followed by ContainerOpen(dishwasher_door).
